metadata.title: CVE-2022-39374 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Synapse is an open-source Matrix homeserver written and maintained by theMatrix.org Foundation. If Synapse and a malicious homeserver are bothjoined to the same room, the malicious homeserver can trick Synapse intoaccepting previously rejected events into its view of the current state ofthat room. This can be exploited in a way that causes all further messagesand state changes sent in that room from the vulnerable homeserver to berejected. This issue has been patched in version 1.68.0

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
